attributes.action: Do the right thing for the British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do the right thing for the British people, for the long term. Forget political correctness, forget trendy modern management, and European law...do the right thing for us! MR BLAIR!....STAND UP AND DO WHAT WE WANT YOU TO DO, NOT JUST WHAT YOU WANT, USING THE EXCUSE OF HAVING THE VOTERS MANDATE, BECAUSE AFTER 10 YEARS, YOU DON'T. EVERY RIGHT-MINDED BRITON IS CRYING OUT FOR IT. WAKE UP AND SEE THE TRUTH!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
